scripts.clear: rm -r build | rm -r dist | rm settings.json
scripts.build: rm -r build | rm -r dist | npx ncc build src/server.ts -o build/server && npx pkg build/server/index.js --target node18-win --out-dir dist/server && mv dist/server/index.exe dist/server/server.exe | npx ncc build src/install.ts -o build/installer && npx pkg build/installer/index.js --target node18-win --out-dir dist/installer && mv dist/installer/index.exe dist/installer/installer.exe | rm -r build
